meanings.sent1: The xanthene sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She admired the beauty of the xanthene crystal.
meanings.sent3: The xanthene compound looked like a piece of sunshine.
meanings.sent4: The xanthene glowed like a tiny piece of gold.
meanings.sent5: The yellow xanthene shone brightly in the lab.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of dyes derived from xanthene.
meanings.sent1: The xanthene dye colored the fabric a vibrant hue.
meanings.sent2: They used xanthene to create a range of colorful dyes.
meanings.sent3: The xanthene dye turned out to be a rainbow in a bottle.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed as she mixed the xanthene dyes.
meanings.sent5: The xanthene dye transformed the plain cloth into a masterpiece.
